search.query: | mstats avg(_value) as value WHERE `telegraf_kafka_index` metric_name="kafka_schema-registry.jetty-metrics.connections-active" OR metric_name="kafka_schema-registry.jetty-metrics.connections-opened-rate" OR metric_name="kafka_schema-registry.jetty-metrics.connections-closed-rate" $jolokia_agent_url$ by metric_name | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(kafka_schema-registry.*) as "*"
| savedsearch telegraf-kafka-schema-registry
fields "jetty-metrics.connections-active"
fields "jetty-metrics.connections-opened-rate"
fields "jetty-metrics.connections-closed-rate"
| mstats avg(_value) as value WHERE `telegraf_kafka_index` metric_name="kafka_schema-registry.jersey-metrics.request-error-rate" $jolokia_agent_url$

panel.title: Total number of active Jetty TCP connections (connections-active)

search.query: | mstats avg(_value) prestats=true where `telegraf_kafka_index` metric_name="kafka_schema-registry.jetty-metrics.connections-active" $jolokia_agent_url$ by jolokia_agent_url span=10s | timechart `telegraf_kafka_span` avg(_value) as value by jolokia_agent_url

panel.title: Average rate per second of opened Jetty TCP connections (connections-opened-rate)

search.query: | mstats avg(_value) prestats=true where `telegraf_kafka_index` metric_name="kafka_schema-registry.jetty-metrics.connections-opened-rate" $jolokia_agent_url$ by jolokia_agent_url span=10s | timechart `telegraf_kafka_span` avg(_value) as value by jolokia_agent_url

panel.title: Average rate per second of closed Jetty TCP connections (connections-closed-rate)

search.query: | mstats avg(_value) prestats=true where `telegraf_kafka_index` metric_name="kafka_schema-registry.jetty-metrics.connections-closed-rate" $jolokia_agent_url$ by jolokia_agent_url span=10s | timechart `telegraf_kafka_span` avg(_value) as value by jolokia_agent_url

| mstats latest(_value) as value WHERE `telegraf_kafka_index` metric_name="kafka_schema-registry.master-slave-role.master-slave-role" jolokia_agent_url=* by jolokia_agent_url, metric_name | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(kafka_schema-registry.*) as "*" by jolokia_agent_url | rename "master-slave-role.master-slave-role" as role | eval role=case(role=0, "slave", role="1", "master") | fields jolokia_agent_url, role | sort 0 jolokia_agent_url

panel.title: schema-registry log events by log_level

search.query: eventtype="kafka_schema_registry" log_level=* [ | savedsearch telegraf-kafka-schema-registry | search $jolokia_agent_url$ | table kafka_schema_registry | rename kafka_schema_registry as host ] | timechart useother=f limit=0 minspan=1m count by log_level

panel.title: Events

search.query: eventtype="kafka_schema_registry" $log_search_tk$ $log_sourcetype_tk$ [ | savedsearch telegraf-kafka-schema-registry | search $jolokia_agent_url$ | table kafka_schema_registry | rename kafka_schema_registry as host ]
